name: GetProjectMemberInfo
description:
Retrieve information for a specific project member.

This tool retrieves information about a specific member of a project for users with the Enterprise plan in Miro. It requires 'projects:read' scope and Company Admin rights. Use this tool to gain insights into project member roles and details in an enterprise setting.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team to which the project belongs.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project to retrieve specific member information from.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project from which you want to retrieve specific member information.

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: ID of the member whose information you want to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The ID of the member for which you want to retrieve information.
